SEARCH
Package sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller

Class AuthController

java.lang.Object
sustech.cs304.AIDE.controller.AuthController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/auth") public class AuthController extends Object
Controller for handling authentication-related requests. This class provides endpoints for logging in with GitHub, X (formerly Twitter), and Google.

    • githubLogin

      @GetMapping("/github") public String githubLogin()
      Initiates the GitHub login process.
      Returns:
      The URL for GitHub OAuth authorization.

    • xLohin

      @GetMapping("/x") public String xLohin()
      Initiates the X login process.
      Returns:
      The URL for X OAuth authorization.

    • googleLogin

      @GetMapping("/google") public String googleLogin()
      Initiates the Google login process.
      Returns:
      The URL for Google OAuth authorization.

    • githubCallback

      @GetMapping("/callback/github") @Transactional public User githubCallback(@RequestParam("code") String code, @RequestParam("state") String state)
      Handles the GitHub OAuth callback.
      Parameters:
      code - The authorization code received from GitHub.
      state - The state parameter for CSRF protection.
      Returns:
      The authenticated user.

    • xCallback

      @GetMapping("/callback/x") public User xCallback(@RequestParam("code") String code)
      Handles the X OAuth callback.
      Parameters:
      code - The authorization code received from X.
      Returns:
      The authenticated user.

    • googleCallback

      @GetMapping("/callback/google") @Transactional public User googleCallback(@RequestParam("code") String code, @RequestParam("state") String state)
      Handles the Google OAuth callback.
      Parameters:
      code - The authorization code received from Google.
      state - The state parameter for CSRF protection.
      Returns:
      The authenticated user.

    • handleCallback

      @GetMapping("/callback/loginStatus/{x}") public String handleCallback(@PathVariable("x") String x)
      Handles the callback for login status.
      Parameters:
      x - The sequence number for login status.
      Returns:
      The login status and ID.
